thread.title: Hrithik Roshan: Would happily lose to Eman in a dance-off - Entertainment
thread.title_full: Hrithik Roshan: Would happily lose to Eman in a dance-off - Entertainment

title: Hrithik Roshan: Would happily lose to Eman in a dance-off - Entertainment
text:
By Sonil Dedhia | Posted 47 minutes ago Now Available on the mid-day iOS App, Download Now 
Eman; (inset) Hrithik Roshan 
It might be confounding that a bariatric surgery patient from Egypt has drawn the attention of Bollywood celebs, but for Eman Ahmad, film folk have emerged as big supporters. 
Touted to be the world's heaviest woman, Eman, who arrived at Mumbai's Saifee Hospital on February 10, requires Rs 1 crore to lose the flab and lead a normal life. Last week, mid-day had reported that Hrithik Roshan's mother, Pinky, made a contribution of R10 lakh for her surgery. 
Pinky also visited the 37-year-old along with daughter Sunaina. During the meeting, Eman's sister, Shaimaa, told them that Eman is a fan of Hrithik's and hoped to challenge him for a dance-off once on her feet. 
Reacting to her statement, Hrithik says, "I would love to dance with Eman. In fact, I am eager to meet her." Hrithik, who is currently out of the country, added, "She has the opportunity of inspiring millions of people through her fight against life threatening obesity. Once her treatment is complete, I would accept her dance challenge and happily lose to her. But before that, we all must support her in every way possible." Tags:
